website_summaries.verdict: Inexperienced home cooks will definitely find the T-Fal OptiGrill's automatic operation a comfort but if you're confident in the kitchen you'll want an appliance with more control and abilities.
pros: The T-Fal OptiGrill takes much of the guesswork out of cooking by automatically adjusting grill time and sensing its internal temperature
It gives meat and poultry convincing grilled flavor plus functions as a competent panini sandwich press in a pinch
cons: It tends to overcook what it grills and can't handle raw eggs or batter for pancake and waffles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this grill! I used it to make dry rubbed pork chops my first time yesterday and they came out perfectly! Very juicy and tender. There is no need to check your meat like you do on a foreman grill. It literally does all the work for you. My 1.5in chops were Cooked to perfection in about 10 mins. One suggestion when using this is to season your meat a little less than usual. I use heavy seasoning when outdoor grilling because a lot seems to melt off on a traditional grill but with this you don't lose a lot of your seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Bowman

customer_reviews.title: excellent technology !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: works flawless, no issues . you must follow operating instruction or you will have problems like other users... if you follow t-fals operating instructions for use you will not have any problems... very intelligent cooking grill.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A must have for busy professionals and families looking for a quick grilling solution.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great grill. A must for most any kitchen and busy professionals. Cooks food extremely well, juicy, flavorful and fast. Clean up simply does not get any easier than this grills removable plates. easily worth 2X what I paid but I like that I was able to pick it up at such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset with my purchase. The quality is so cheap. I saw this grill on YouTube and bought it just because of bloggers reviews, you can cook meat , fish and vegetables without any oil. Unfortunatly it’s not true and everything stuck to this grill! Maybe it’s a problem with the seller and it’s fake Tefal. I don’t recommend to by this grill from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan Yarovenko

customer_reviews.title: No more burned or gas smelly food.  Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: No more burned or gas smelly food. Wife loves it. Quick and easy. So far we cooked steaks, salmon, chicken, sweet potatoes, and some pine apples, mmmmm! Yummy! With this kind of weather who wants to cook outside? You can cook very easy for two to four people.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one. The 1st one had issues, but no problems with this one. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern Star

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard  Appliance.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Rach time I attempted to use it my breakers tripped in my house. Seller required me to return item at my own expense. Seller has not refunded my money or responded to my request for a refund. Do Not Buy From this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfaction

customer_reviews.title: The best indoor opti grill
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean faster to cook I wish the plates were flat and can be reversible where you can cook eggs bacon or pancakes but overall its great to have it.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: The best investment I’ve ever made!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best investment I’ve ever made!! I cook chicken, brats, hotdogs, hamburgers and more. It’s so fast and easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Tesar

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't a new one
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty dirty when I first received it.. product detail said only the box was damaged and grill was new, but that was not true.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: T-Fal OptiGrill Plus... Plus what? Plus a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The first time that I used this grill, it worked perfectly. Each subsequent time, however, none of the buttons work - so I cannot select steak, hamburger, fish or chicken. At first I thought it was something I was doing wrong, so I googled the issue. It turns out that MANY people have complained about this problem. So here is my advise - don't purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thousand Oaks Gal

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an amazing appliance. Cooks exactly the way you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago. I don't use it every day and I clean it after each use.I mostly cook fish or turkey burgers on it. It is now falling apart. The seams are separating. I don't even move this item around it sits on my counter. Very disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Cooking Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Automatic cooking only works less than 25% of the time. You must hover over it to make sure it doesn't shut off or change to manual mode. Would have been better off with a manual grill at least then I would have more than 4 manual temp settings. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Was previously used.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new product and got something that had been previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Product does everything I have wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Product does everything I have wanted. Have been pleased with grilled sandwiches, vegetables, pork loin and chicken. I highly recommend this product to any one.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I bought it and it worked for the first time but it switched to manual mode and It didn't switch back to the normal mode ! And second time it just didn't work !! I checked the guide book " appliance failuare " it said Such a worthless grill , not worth your time or your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bardzo dobry produkt kazdy powinien miec go w swojej kuchni!
customer_reviews.author: rafal nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used twice, timer thing is a joke burns every thing so far, but cooks as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Well here is ho[ing that tfal does something. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Well here is ho[ing that tfal does something. I bought this POS on June 20 and here it is aug 7 and it doesnt work. NOT IMPRESSED Will update if Tfal does anything about this
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but falls short
customer_reviews.text: I've tried getting a hold of seller and even reached out to T-fal and no valid responses l. I've now purchased 2 grills and neither work the way they should. They do cook food but only on manual setting. The buttons on handle for preset cooking (e.g., Steak, poultry) don't work. I bought a 3 year warranty and hope someone actually contacts me who can remedy this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it - the fact that you dont have to defrost save me so much time and planning
customer_reviews.author: didsk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill!  Saves time and money.
customer_reviews.text: This grill has far exceeded our expectations. It is easy to use and takes all the work (and guesswork) out of grilling. We've saved a ton of money preparing meals with this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for daughter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: T-Fal Optigrill is awrsome!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great. Saw it in stores for $40 more. It cooks steak and burgers to perfection!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Buckin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Smarter than the person I purchased it for, he uses it regularly and really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Hall

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE GRILL
customer_reviews.text: What a great appliance. Easy to clean and operate, and cooked my burgers to perfection. Love this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cheeto

customer_reviews.title: Grills way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Grills way better than I expected. I love the sensor cooking for meats! I am sure when it is done right the first time. Great for just about all meats. I found the 3rd setting of manual mode great for bacon if you like it crispy. No smoke and grease splashing everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Budd

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is terrific. Cooks food properly based on programming. The last 2 times I used it, the programming did not work. It went directly into manual mode. Called Customer Service yesterday. A very helpful Rep walked me through what I'll call 're-programming'. Took 3-4 minutes, all done, works like new.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: GEtting off of Manual
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced the dreaded automatic switch to Manual (M). It is really disturbing. However, I found that if I sprayed the plates with Pam or other cooking spray, it does not go to manual. So, my thinking is that as the plates wear, they somehow cause the shift to manual. That sounds a little ghostly, but I'm satisfied. My big complaint is that there are no griddle plates for pancakes and other breakfast things.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Quit working on anything other than the manual setting after one week. Was able to reboot it by unplugging it so that when plugged back in the automatic settings would work again. Used it several more times then none of the automatic settings would work, period. Only manual setting. Could have paid half the price for something reliable with only manual settings. T-fal customer service would not respond to emails. It's beyond return date to Amazon. I'm cutting my losses and am going to offer it free to a new home with full disclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Howard

customer_reviews.title: Unit refuses to turn. Just flashing light with sandwich and sausage light flashing. Impossible to reset.
customer_reviews.text: Prepare for garbage heap. Unit does not work. Impossible to fix. Avoid OptiGrill!
customer_reviews.author: R. San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Worked 3 times and now just blinks. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jaques Cartier

customer_reviews.title: This grill is absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is absolutely amazing!!! I didn't even cook before the opti grill and now I love cooking every night!! My 14 year old daughter cooks her own meals now!!! I've recommended it to several of my friends and now 8 of them own the opti grill and love it!! It's priceless!! It thinks for you, no more guessing when your food is cooked to perfection. Anyone that writes a poor review in this grill needs to have their head examined!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor grill for apartment living or for smaller households. Meat stays juicy and tender. Easy to clean and operate. The cookbook supplied offers lots of yummy recipes. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: FashionableMom

customer_reviews.title: Love our grill
customer_reviews.text: Love our grill. Use it all the time. Never went out on the deck to grill this summer because this is easier, faster and everything comes out perfect each time. Will be a Christmas present for my daughter and her three girls this year.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Great product for our family of 6!
customer_reviews.text: I have used every setting on this product and love it! Helps cook quick healthy meals any day of the week with our busy schedule!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Haynes

customer_reviews.title: It was so nice to have a grill that I could fry and ...
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy this grill for me and my family. It was so nice to have a grill that I could fry and grill chicken at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love the slow cooker, but, the handle in the lid is metal so it gets very hot as you use it.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After ten months of ownership, this no longer works on anything but manual mode. I don't know how long it will keep working if it was that quick for the "sensor" cooking to fail. It appears I am not the only one to have this problem with this machine. T-Fal used to be a name for quality, I think that time is long gone. This was an expensive lesson, as I bought this in a physical store for much more than it sells here at Amazon. (I had received a gift card and chose to use it on this)
customer_reviews.author: Kat S

customer_reviews.title: BoobieTrap
customer_reviews.text: This is least reliable product for cooking ever! It needs resetting more than it ever works. It is like a boobie trap will it cook will it burn or will do as it supposed to. A ywork in progress needing to be hooked up by an app to your phone instead of this "controls"
customer_reviews.author: ezonline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 5 person home!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the grill worked perfectly for everything we cooked in it. It set up easily, the user guide was pretty simple to understand. it's very easy to clean, the panel comes right out to be placed in the dish washer; unlike the George Foreman grill, which was such a bulky, hassle to clean! Steaks were cooked perfectly on every setting, we cooked sandwiches, pork, fish, and vegetables all without an issue. I would defiantly buy again & recommend this grill to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: it was like a picture
customer_reviews.text: The first time that I used this, I was blown away at how perfectly it cooked a steak, it was like a picture. However, immediately after that first use, the ability to choose a meat type no longer worked - as soon as the item is plugged in and turned on, it lights up the temperature light, but no other buttons are working. It's awful expensive to fail after one single use. I'm VERY not happy right now! I had such high hope!
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Dig It

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT AND HEALTHY GRILL.
customer_reviews.text: I love my OptiGrill and use it almost every day. The only thing that I do not like about it is that the grill is not reversible to be used as a griddle to cook eggs, pancakes, etc. Other than that, this grill is perfect to fit my needs, and results in very healthy cooking with the grease rolling off into the grease container. Food cooked in this grill is very moist and tender, and as everyone else has said, FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS. LET IT HEAT UP PROPERLY BEFORE PUTTING YOU FOOD ON THE GRILL.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little indoor grill I have ever used. I love the indicator light on the handle that lets you know when the meat is at a certain temperature. The few items that I have cooked on it have turned out great. I also love the automatic settings. Another great feature with this grill is that the cooking plates disconnect from the unit making it easy to clean by just placing the cooking plates in the dishwasher. I would definitely buy this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Heat sensor failure?
customer_reviews.text: Paid top dollar for appliance that has th frequently must be recalibrated, and now burns everything to well done if not monitored by the minute.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome New Grill
customer_reviews.text: I have mainly used the optigrill for cooking burgers and steaks. I love the fact that you can choose how you want it cooked " rare or medium rare " this is the best option you can set it and when it's done it will turn itself off. I will definitely be recommending this to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: debra brown

customer_reviews.title: The T-Fal Opti Grill Plus is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Sure it worked fine the first two weeks I owned it, then it was all downhill from there with nothing but issues with it. I just received my Opti Grill Plus back from warranty repair without a note saying what was done to fix my crappy grill, or what they found wrong with it. It's Saturday, you can best believe I'll be on the phone first thing Monday morning with T-Fal customer service. To pay this much for a grill I expect way better customer service than this, and a much better working grill to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jones

customer_reviews.title: We contagion amazon to be robbed. it cost much less at least right now from
customer_reviews.text: Th manufacturer. If you use there payment plan it will cost 180 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cline

product_meta.title: T-Fal GC712D54 OptiGrill + Grill with Automatic Sensor Cooking, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Web exclusive! For a precise cook every time, you want the T-Fal indoor OptiGrill in your kitchen. This grill features "automatic sensor cooking" Technology to read the amount of items you place on the grill and detect their thickness to adjust the time and temperature. The result is an even distribution of heat between each snack being cooked. Along With 6 programs and 2 modes for a wide variety of foods ranging from meats to vegetables, The OptiGrill is sure to become your favorite kitchen appliance.
feature_bullets: Adjusts to your needs, lift up the lid to pick up your meat when it's ready and leave the rest to carry on cooking.
6 cooking programs (red meat, burger, poultry, sandwich, sausage, fish) to automatically adapt the temperature to each type of food and cook it perfectly as required.
600cm2 cooking surface (capacity 2 to 4 people) made with non-stick die-cast aluminum plates.
An indicator light allows cooking progress to be Monitored directly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
